content.rendered:
The Azumi Desking range is an extremely versatile desking range. Available in single desks (as shown here) or benches.

In a range of colours, sizes and finishes, you can make your office space, work for you!

With a wide range of accessories to suit, such as cable trays & screens you can customise your space to work for your needs.

Held in stock for delivery in 2-3 working days and easy to assemble, there is no delay!
